# üìå Context-Free Grammar and Pushdown Automata Implementation

## üìñ Project Overview

This project implements a Context-Free Grammar (CFG) and a Pushdown Automaton (PDA) to recognize strings based on the grammar:

<pre>
S ‚Üí aSb | Œµ
</pre>

It consists of three Python scripts:

üîπ **Algorithm 1:** Generates strings that either belong or do not belong to the language.  
üîπ **Algorithm 2:** Implements a PDA that validates the strings.  
üîπ **Algorithm 3:** **Main Algorithm** ‚Äì This script imports and executes both Algorithm 1 and Algorithm 2, and in addition, builds a derivation tree for accepted strings.

**Note:** Although Algorithms 1 and 2 can be run individually to observe their respective functionalities, executing Algorithm 3 is sufficient to see the complete process in action.

## üìú **Team** 

üîπJuan Manuel Gallo L√≥pez

üîπDavid Garcia Zapata

üîπ**Class code:** 7309


## üöÄ **How to Run the Project** 

1Ô∏è‚É£ Clone the Repository

Ensure you have Python installed and then clone this repository:

 git clone [repository-link](https://github.com/EAFIT-AACS/assigment2-david-garcia-juan-manuel-gallo/edit/main/README.md)
 
 cd <repository-folder>

2Ô∏è‚É£ Run the Algorithms

To run individual algorithms:
If you want to test Algorithm 1 and Algorithm 2 separately, you can execute them individually:
<pre>
python algorithm_1.py
python algorithm_2.py
</pre>

To run the complete integrated process:
Execute Algorithm 3, which imports and runs Algorithms 1 and 2, and also displays the derivation tree:
<pre>
python algorithm_3.py
</pre>
‚ö†Ô∏è**Important:** When running Algorithm 3, a pop-up window displaying the derivation tree will appear. To view the different trees, close the current window and the next tree window will automatically open.

## üìÇ **File Structure**
<pre>
üìÇ project-folder/
 ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ algorithm_1.py  # String Generator
 ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ algorithm_2.py  # PDA Implementation
 ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ algorithm_3.py  # Derivation Tree Builder
 ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md       # Project documentation
</pre>

## üìå **Example Outputs**

### üéØ **Algorithm 1 (String Generation)**
<pre>
Generated Strings:
üîπ ab
üîπ aabb
üîπ babb
üîπ aab
 
</pre>

### üéØ Algorithm 2 (PDA Validation)
<pre>
La cadena 'ab' ‚úÖ is accepted by the PDA.
La cadena 'aabb' ‚úÖ is accepted by the PDA.
La cadena 'babb' ‚ùå is rejected by the PDA.
La cadena 'aab' ‚ùå is rejected by the PDA.
</pre>
